TriggerGroup.name: capture beacon

Trigger.name: beacon capture
Trigger.script:
local distance = tonumber(matches[2]) local dir = matches[3] local zone = matches[4] local x = tonumber(matches[5]) local y = tonumber(matches[6]) local desc = matches[7] local color = "#00ffff"
if string.match(desc, "mineable") or string.match(desc, "harvestable") then color = "#ffff99" elseif string.match(desc, "Planet") or string.match(desc, "Satellite") or string.match(desc, "Sun") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid CS") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid RS") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid CA") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid RA") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid VAI") then color = "#e0e0e0" elseif string.match(desc, "station") or string.match(desc, "voidgate") then color = "#ffb266" elseif string.find(desc, "#%d+") then if not string.match(desc, "structure") then ship_id = string.sub(string.match(desc, "#%d+"), 2) if string.match(desc, "from Song") then color = "#ff33ff" elseif string.match(desc, "from Scat") then color = "#cc6600" elseif string.match(desc, "from Cele") then color = "#0080ff" else if target ~= nil and string.match(desc, target) then desc = "> "..desc color = "#ff0707" end end end end
for ship_id in string.gmatch(desc, "#%d+") do ship_id = string.sub(ship_id, 2) hechoLink('beacon', color..' '..distance.." "..dir.."\t"..desc.."\n",function() send('st '..ship_id) end,"target this "..ship_id,true) end
if not string.find(desc, "#%d+") then hecho('beacon', color..' '..distance.." "..dir.."\t"..desc.."\n") end

<yellow> Nightstalker recommends allowing the client to wrap text. Click here to do so!', [[send('config wrapwidth 0')]],'config wrapwidth 0', true) sym.hunter.triggy(gmcp.Char.Status.class) sym.pvp.triggy(gmcp.Char.Status.class) end )

Trigger.name: crew status
Trigger.script: local crewmember = matches[2] local crewcurrenthp = tonumber(matches[3]) local crewmaxhp = tonumber(matches[4]) local crewroom = matches[5] local crewrmdesc = matches[6] local namespacer = 12 - string.len(crewmember) local spacer = ' ' local repspacer = string.rep(spacer, namespacer) local crewper = math.floor(100 * crewcurrenthp / crewmaxhp) local function getSystemColour(amount) amount = tonumber(amount) if amount >= 92.5 then return 'spring_green' elseif amount >= 70 then return 'ansi_227' elseif amount >= 30 then return 'dark_orange' else return 'red' end end cechoLink('Crew','\n' ..crewmember ..' '.. repspacer ..'<' .. getSystemColour(crewper) .. '>'.. crewcurrenthp ..' ' .. crewroom .. ' ' .. crewrmdesc,[[send("path track ]] .. crewroom ..[[")]],'travel to crewmember', true)

Trigger.name: weapon calc
Trigger.script:
local weptype = matches[2] local wepnumber = matches[3] local wepname = matches[4] local weppower = matches[5] local weplevel = matches[6] local wepdura = matches[7]
if tonumber(weppower) >= 9650 then selectCaptureGroup(5) setFgColor(0, 255, 0) end if tonumber(weppower) >= 9655 then selectCaptureGroup(5) setFgColor(250, 32, 240) end if tonumber(weppower) >= 9660 then selectCaptureGroup(5) setFgColor(255, 215, 0) end

Trigger.name: armor calc
Trigger.script:
local armor = matches[3] local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class local res1 = tonumber(matches[4]) local res2 = tonumber(matches[5]) local res3 = tonumber(matches[6]) local res4 = tonumber(matches[7]) local res5 = tonumber(matches[8]) local res6 = tonumber(matches[9]) local res7 = tonumber(matches[10]) local total = res1 + res2 + res3 + res4 + res5 + res6 + res7 local resTable = {res1, res2, res3, res4, res5, res6, res7} local resType = {'imp', 'EM', 'thr', 'cel', 'men', 'dra', 'elc'} local max = total * 1.05 local epic = 274 local value = "white" deleteLine() if class == 'Fury' or class == 'Scoundrel' then if total >= (epic * .5) then value = 'gold' elseif total >= (epic * .5 - 1) then value = 'magenta' elseif total >= (epic * .5 - 2) then value = 'dodger_blue' elseif total >= (epic * .5 - 3) then value = 'green' elseif total >= (epic * .5 - 4) then value = 'green' elseif total >= (epic * .5 - 5) then value = 'gray' end elseif class == 'Nanoseer' or class == 'Engineer' then if total >= (epic * .75) then value = 'gold' elseif total >= (epic * .75 - 1) then value = 'magenta' elseif total >= (epic * .75 - 2) then value = 'dodger_blue' elseif total >= (epic * .75 - 3) then value = 'green' elseif total >= (epic * .75 - 4) then value = 'green' elseif total >= (epic * .75 - 5) then value = 'gray' end elseif class == 'B.E.A.S.T.' then if total >= epic then value = 'gold' elseif total >= (epic - 1) then value = 'magenta' elseif total >= (epic - 2) then value = 'dodger_blue' elseif total >= (epic - 3) then value = 'green' elseif total >= (epic - 4) then value = 'green' elseif total >= (epic - 5) then value = 'gray' end end
cecho('\n<navajo_white>'..string.format("% 5s", matches[2])..': <'..value..'>' .. string.format("% 6s", armor) .. ' <navajo_white> Total Value: <'..value..'>' .. string.format("%.2f",total)) -- armor upgrade code thanks to Mystor! cechoLink("<navajo_white> (equip armor)\n", [[send("armor upgrade ]]..matches[2]..[[ with ]]..armor..[[")]], "armor upgrade " .. matches[2].." with "..armor, true) for i, resValue in ipairs(resTable) do if resValue >= 40 and class == 'B.E.A.S.T.' then cecho(string.format("% 5s",resType[i])..":<cyan> "..string.format("%.2f", resValue)..' ') elseif resValue >= 30 and (class == 'Nanoseer' or class == 'Engineer') then cecho(string.format("% 5s",resType[i])..":<cyan> "..string.format("%.2f", resValue)..' ') elseif resValue >= 20 and (class == 'Fury' or class == 'Scoundrel') then cecho(string.format("% 5s",resType[i])..":<cyan> "..string.format("%.2f", resValue)..' ') else cecho(string.format("% 5s",resType[i])..":<gray> "..string.format("%.2f", resValue)..' ') end end

Trigger.name: wilderness mapping on
Trigger.script: last_wilderness = gmcp.Room.Info.area expandAlias("map create on") expandAlias("area delete "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) expandAlias("rlc v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num.." 0 0 0") expandAlias("area add "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) expandAlias("room area "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) expandAlias('room mark entrance')

Trigger.name: wilderness mapping off
Trigger.script: expandAlias("map create on") expandAlias("area delete "..last_wilderness) expandAlias("map create off") expandAlias('room unmark entrance')

regexCodeList.string: With a cry of relief, you find the exit from the cache and dive out, evading your attackers.
^Swiveling their boosters quickly to one side\, you push a blast of green-blue energy .+ and zoom off to the the void\, evading your attackers\.$

TriggerGroup.name: ship
TriggerGroup.script: sym.ships = sym.ships or {} sym.ships.flags = sym.ships.flags or {}

Trigger.name: backfire tracking
Trigger.script: local system = matches[2] if matches[3] ~= "No" and (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.ship_shield) > 0) then if not sym.space.restart then sym.space.restart = tempTimer(5, function() send("ship restart " .. system) sym.echo("Restarting " .. system) sym.space.restart = false end) end end if matches[2] == "Engine" then engine_bf = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "Shield" then shield_bf = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "Capacitor" then capacitor_bf = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "Sensor" then sensor_bf = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "Shipsim" then sim_bf = matches[3] else end

Trigger.name: astromechs
Trigger.script: sym.space.flags.astromechs = true deleteLine() cecho('\n<blue:black>Astromechs:<white> Beginning repairs of the <yellow>'..matches[2].. ' system<white>.. Standby.')

Trigger.name: astromechs cooldown
Trigger.script: sym.space.flags.astromechs = false deleteLine() cecho('\n<blue:black>Astromechs:<white> The <red>'..matches[2].. ' system<white> has been fully repaired.')

regexCodeList.string: ^The damage tears through .+ system\, bringing it to .+\.$

Trigger.name: partial repair completed
Trigger.script: sym.hunter.flags.astromechs = false deleteLine() cecho('\n<blue:black>Astromechs:<white> The <red>'..matches[2].. ' system<orange> has completed partial repairs.') sym.shiprepair()

regexCodeList.string: ^Astromechs plug into the ship's mainframe and run complex quantum subroutines on the (.+)\, repairing some damage\.$
^Astromechs crawl through the (.) armed with hydrospanners and sonic screwdrivers\, repairing some damage\.$
^Astromechs clank and skitter through the ship's maintenance ducts while working on the (.+) generators\, repairing some damage\.$
^Astromechs weld patch panels to the ship's (.+) plates\, repairing some damage\.$
^Astromechs re-attach wires and reorient arrays in the ship's (.+) system\, repairing some damage\.$
Keying a switch on your navigation console, you do a scan of the surrounding area.
You cannot trigger that module again so soon.
The ship's targeting systems are already attempting to lock onto a target.
Your target has left your targeting cone.
There is no such target anywhere nearby.
There is no such weapon on the ship.
^.+ requires a lock on the target\.$
That weapon cannot be used against organic targets.
There is no cargo in that direction.
There is no such target in targeting range.
You send out your beacon, but there is nothing within range.

Trigger.name: ship balance
Trigger.script:
if sym.space.boarded then deleteLine() else -- systems checking while not piloting local vitals = gmcp.Char.Vitals local sym_ww = (vitals.ww == "1" and true or false) local efficacy = {"wetwiring_efficacy", "mind_efficacy", "muscular_efficacy", "internal_efficacy", "sensory_efficacy"} local systems = {"wetwiring", "mind", "muscular", "internal", "sensory"} if not sym_ww then return end for _, system in pairs(systems) do local value = math.floor(tonumber(vitals[system])) local evalue = tonumber(vitals[efficacy[_]]) if value <= 92.5 and evalue >= 85 then sym.echo('You should mend your '..system..' system') canmend = true break else canmend = false end end
end

Trigger.name: shields broken (self)
Trigger.script: -- immediately prep repairs to hull in case they are using mixed ammo send('ship repair hull')

regexCodeList.string: ^.+ halts gracefully to avoid collision with asteroid\.$

Trigger.name: how much refined
Trigger.script:
local refined = math.floor(matches[3] / 5) local comm_amount = matches[3] local comm_location = matches[4]
if matches[2] == "helium" then local material = "helium11" cechoLink( '<dark_salmon> ' .. refined .. ' refined', function() send('refinery queue ' .. refined .. ' ' .. material..' at refinery_' ..comm_location) end, "click to refine", true ) else local material = matches[2] cechoLink( '<dark_salmon> ' .. refined .. ' refined', function() send('refinery queue ' .. refined .. ' ' .. material..' at refinery_' ..comm_location) end, "click to refine", true ) end

Trigger.name: store tech
Trigger.script: if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == 'bridge' then send('cargo store all ' ..matches[2].. '_tech') end

Trigger.name: research tech
Trigger.script: local sendtotal = matches[3] local tech = matches[2] for i=1, sendtotal, 1 do send("workshop re " ..tech) end

regexCodeList.string: The ship shoots a multifield tether at an asteroid, catching it and hooking it to itself.

Trigger.name: auto insurance
Trigger.script: local contract = matches[2] send('cargo contracts '..contract..' insure yes')

regexCodeList.string: ^You have created a new cargo contract #(\d+)\.$

Trigger.name: missile counter
Trigger.script: if not sym.space.flags.countermeasures and not sym.space.flags.missilesinbound then local firetime = matches[2] * .85 sym.space.flags.missilesinbound = true tempTimer( firetime, function() send('ship countermeasures') sym.space.flags.missilesinbound = false end ) end

regexCodeList.string: The ship shoots countermeasures around its hull.
The ship is again ready to fire countermeasures.

Trigger.name: weapon autoassign module
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == "Interdictor Beam" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' iterdict') elseif matches[3] == "Laser Beam I" or matches[3] == "Laser Beam II" or matches[3] == "Laser Beam III" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' lasers') elseif matches[3] == "Targeted Missile I" or matches[3] == "Targeted Missile II" or matches[3] == "Targeted Missile III" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' missiles') elseif matches[3] == "Massive Cannon I" or matches[3] == "Massive Cannon II" or matches[3] == "Massive Cannon III" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' mcannons') elseif matches[3] == "Cannon I" or matches[3] == "Cannon II" or matches[3] == "Cannon III" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' cannons') elseif matches[3] == "Slicekit" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' slicer') elseif matches[3] == "Cap Drainer" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' drainer') else end

Trigger.name: ship weapons tracking
Trigger.script: sym.space.weapon = sym.space.weapon or {} sym.space.weapon[matches[2]] = {} sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].type = matches[3] --em thermal kinetic gravitic sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].ammo = matches[4] sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].charges = matches[5] sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].reloadspeed = matches[6] sym.space.weapon[matches[2]].ready = matches[8]

Trigger.name: enemy shields down
Trigger.script: sym.space.targetshields = false if math.floor(gmcp.Char.Vitals.ship_cap / gmcp.Char.Vitals.ship_cap_max * 100) >= 50 then fireHull() end

regexCodeList.string: You have broken the shields on your target!
That is not a known ship type.

Trigger.name: enemy shields up
Trigger.script: -- this isn't going to be actually accurate until I add in pattern matching for the actual ship target but quick fix if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == 'bridge' then sym.space.targetshields = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^The shields around .+ begin to flicker with new life\.$
The shipsim locks down into combat mode. Diverting power to main weapon systems. Maximum ship speed limited to 50%.
Your quantum cargo net activates, retrieving the cargo to your cargohold.

Trigger.name: enemy shields tracking
Trigger.script: target_ship_hull = tonumber(matches[2]) target_ship_shield = tonumber(matches[3]) if target_ship_hull >= 0 and target_ship_shield <= 0 then sym.space.targetshields = false else sym.space.targetshields = true end

Trigger.name: ship scan line
Trigger.script: if sym.space.boarded then selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() end

Trigger.name: enemy ship tracking
Trigger.script: target_ship_bearing = matches[2] target_ship_distance = tonumber(matches[3]) local function getSystemColour(amount) amount = tonumber(amount) if amount >= 92.5 then return 'misty_rose' elseif amount >= 70 then return 'ansi_227' elseif amount >= 30 then return 'dark_orange' else return 'red' end end cecho('\n\nAstromech\'s Scan: '..target_ship_name..'\nHull: <'..getSystemColour(target_ship_hull)..'>'..target_ship_hull..' Shield: <'..getSystemColour(target_ship_shield).. '>'..target_ship_shield..'\nHeading: '..target_ship_bearing..' Distance: '..target_ship_distance..'\n ' )

regexCodeList.string: ^You launch an EM beam at .+\. It hits\!

Trigger.name: percent highlights (maybe)
Trigger.script:
local percents = (tonumber(matches[2]) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp)) * 100
if percents >= 92.5 then local red = 230 local green = 250 local blue = 205 selectString(matches[2], 1) setFgColor(red, green, blue) resetFormat() deselect() elseif percents >= 70 then local red = 255 local green = 255 local blue = 0 selectString(matches[2], 1) setFgColor(red, green, blue) resetFormat() deselect() elseif percents >= 30 then local red = 255 local green = 150 local blue = 20 selectString(matches[2], 1) setFgColor(red, green, blue) resetFormat() deselect() else local red = 200 local green = 0 local blue = 0 selectString(matches[2], 1) setFgColor(red, green, blue) resetFormat() deselect() end --echo(getTime(true, "mm:ss:z"))

regexCodeList.string: You are again ready to bind someone.

Hiding in the safety of your cover, you make a few quick and dirty modifications to a spiny shrapnel grenade to increase the radius of the explosion, activate the dangerously short detonation trigger, then huck it out into the open.

You make a few quick and dirty modifications to a handful of explosive putty that you're sure will increase the radius of the resulting explosion. Careless of harm to your own person, you prime the detonation sequence and toss the explosive forward.

Hiding in the safety of your cover, you make a few quick and dirty modifications to a handful of explosive putty to increase the radius of the explosion, activate the dangerously short detonation trigger, then huck it out into the open.
You are again able to prime a room-wide explosive device.

You rearrange a few wires and circuitboards in a handful of explosive putty's detonator, a hair-raising sequence of modifications that makes the whole explosive more dangerous to handle. You hurl it away from you, though if you don't find cover, you will doubtless be caught in the ensuing blast.

Hunkering down behind cover, you rearrange a few wires and circuitboards in a handful of explosive putty's detonator, a hair-raising sequence of modifications that makes the whole explosive more dangerous to handle. After you're done, you get rid of it fast, tossing it out of your hiding place and into the open.
You are again able to prime a mega explosive device.

 <green> Not yet.. bummer, but maybe spasms?') end

shouldheartbreak = 1000 - (matches[2] * 10) echo('
'..shouldheartbreak) if shouldheartbreak + sym.pvp.currentstatic >= 1000 and shouldheartbreak >= 500 then cecho('

 <green> Not yet.. let that wormie wiggle') end

" " ..matches[3].." - "..matches[4]) if matches[3] == "electric" then sym.pvp.currentstatic = sym.pvp.currentstatic + (matches[2] * .1) -- cecho('\n ') cecho('\n Current Static: '..sym.pvp.currentstatic) -- cecho('\n ') end

Trigger.name: subsystem dealt track
Trigger.script: deleteLine() sym.hunter.flags.subsysdealt = tonumber(matches[2]) sym.hunter.flags.lastsubsys = matches[3] cecho("\n Subsys: "..matches[2].. " " ..matches[3]) sym.pvp.flags.enemysubsystems[matches[3]] = sym.pvp.flags.enemysubsystems[matches[3]] - (sym.hunter.flags.subsysdealt * 0.95) local healthPercentage = sym.pvp.flags.enemysubsystems[matches[3]] / 100 healthPercentage = string.format("%.2f", healthPercentage) healthPercentage = tonumber(healthPercentage) if sym.pvp.flags.enemysubsystems[matches[3]] <= 0 then deleteLine() cecho(' This subsystem is dead: ' .. matches[3] .. '') else local color = "" if healthPercentage <= 75 then color = "" end if healthPercentage <= 50 then color = "" end if healthPercentage <= 25 then color = "" end if matches[4]:lower():find(target:lower():gsub("%s", "")) then cecho(color .. " Subsys: " .. healthPercentage .. "% " .. matches[3]) end end if sym.hunter.flags.subsysdealt < 100 and sym.hunter.flags.lastsubsys == "muscular" and (sym.hunter.flags.lastdamage == 'thermal gun' or sym.hunter.flags.lastdamage == 'thermal tech') then deleteLine() sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks = sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks + 1 cecho('\n Currently Blazing\: ' .. sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks .. ' Burns: '..sym.pvp.flags.burns) end

<gray>Targeting: <gray><<red> "..matches[2].." <gray>>") target = matches[2] local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class sym.pvp.flags.enemysubsystems = { wetwiring = 10000, muscular = 10000, internal = 10000, sensory = 10000, mind = 10000 } if class == "Nanoseer" then sym.pvp.flags.rattle = false sym.pvp.flags.sluggish = false sym.pvp.flags.distracted = false sym.pvp.flags.mindaff = 0 sym.pvp.flags.enveloped = false sym.pvp.flags.freezestacks = 0 elseif class == "Engineer" then sym.pvp.currentstatic = 0 sym.pvp.currentshards = 0 enableTimer('static') sym.pvp.flags.worming = false cecho('
 ') cecho('
<ansi_light_cyan> Current Static: '..sym.pvp.currentstatic) cecho('
<ansi_light_red> Current Shards: '..sym.pvp.currentshards) cecho('
 ') elseif class == "B.E.A.S.T." then sym.hunter.flags.combust = false sym.hunter.flags.doused = false sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks = 0 sym.pvp.flags.burns = sym.pvp.flags.burns or 0 cecho('
<red> Currently Blazing\: ' .. sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks .. '
 ') else end if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == 'bridge'then sym.space.targetshields = true end

Trigger.name: antiair
Trigger.script: local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class if class == 'Nanoseer' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('void pull ' .. target) elseif class == 'Engineer' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('operate gravitywell') elseif class == 'B.E.A.S.T.' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('suit grapple ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) elseif class == 'Scoundrel' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('guile jetwash ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) elseif class == 'Fury' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('kith glimmer') end

regexCodeList.string: You are at the wrong elevation to be able to interact with

TriggerGroup.name: cover
TriggerGroup.script: isProp = isProp or {} allProps = allProps or {}

Trigger.name: cover tracking
Trigger.script: for i, item in pairs(sym.ui.roomitems) do if item.id == matches[2] and string.find(matches[5], "[Y]") then table.insert(flipProps, item.id) table.insert(allProps, item.id) elseif item.id == matches[2] and string.find(matches[5], "[X]") then table.insert(coverProps, item.id) table.insert(allProps, item.id) elseif item.id == matches[2] and string.find(matches[5], "[S]") then coverProps.item.id = nil elseif item.id == matches[2] and string.find(matches[5], "[XFCYLSERI]") then table.insert(isProp, item.id) table.insert(allProps, item.id) end end

Trigger.name: sync balance
Trigger.script: sym.hacker.sync = true if #sym.ui.roommobs > 0 then expandAlias('infect') end

Trigger.name: tokenize
SPT Qwho End
Trigger.script: local who_line_b = getLineNumber() for i = who_line_a, who_line_b, 1 do selectCurrentLine() moveCursor(0, who_line_a) deleteLine() deselect() end spt_apiCheck() disableTrigger("SPT Qwho")

Trigger.name: Get Honours Info
Trigger.script: if honoursPerson == nil then return end spt.players[honoursPerson].retired = false

Trigger.name: Pickup Faction
Trigger.script: if matches[2] then local color = "" if matches[2] == "None" then spt.players[honoursPerson].faction = "Rogue" color = "Rogue" else spt.players[honoursPerson].faction = matches[2] color = matches[2] end selectString(matches[2], 1) color = spt.highlighting[color] fg(color) resetFormat() else spt.players[honoursPerson].faction = "Hidden" end

regexCodeList.string: You cannot discern anything else about this individual.

Trigger.name: Pickup Lawless
Trigger.script: if spt.players[honoursPerson] then spt.players[honoursPerson].lawless = matches[2] == "Yes" end

Trigger.name: Pickup Bounty Hunter
Trigger.script: if spt.players[honoursPerson] then spt.players[honoursPerson].bountyHunter = matches[2] == "Yes" end

Trigger.name: Close Trigger
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Get Honours Info",0) raiseEvent("SPT Check Highlight", honoursPerson) honoursPerson = nil spt.canProcess = false

Trigger.name: Close Gag
Trigger.script: honors_line_b = getLineNumber() for i = honors_line_a, honors_line_b, 1 do selectCurrentLine() moveCursor(0, honors_line_b) deleteLine() deselect() end disableTrigger("Honors Gag")
